content.en: Metabolic engineering optimization: Scientists have been using algorithms to optimize metabolic engineering strategies, which involve manipulating genes and metabolic pathways to improve the production of desired compounds in microorganisms. These algorithms, such as OptORF and OptFlux, consider gene deletions, transcriptional regulation, and strain optimization tasks to identify the most effective interventions. By using these computational tools, researchers can design more efficient and productive microorganisms for various applications, from biofuel production to pharmaceutical development.
content.da: Metabolisk engineering-optimering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at optimere metaboliske engineering-strategier, som indebærer manipulation af gener og metaboliske veje for at forbedre produktionen af ønskede forbindelser i mikroorganismer. Disse algoritmer, såsom OptORF og OptFlux, tager hensyn til gen-deletioner, transkriptionel regulering og stammeoptimeringsopgaver for at identificere de mest effektive interventioner. Ved at bruge disse beregningsværktøjer kan forskere designe mere effektive og produktive mikroorganismer til forskellige anvendelser, fra biobrændstofproduktion til farmaceutisk udvikling.
